scripts.start1: npx cross-env version=1 NODE_ENV=develop node server
scripts.start2: npx cross-env version=2 NODE_ENV=develop node server
scripts.start3: npx cross-env version=3 NODE_ENV=develop node server
scripts.install1: npm i -D webpack@1.x --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org && npx webpack version
scripts.install2: npm i -D webpack@2.x --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org && npx webpack version
scripts.install3: npm i -D webpack@3.x --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org && npx webpack version
scripts.build1: rm -fr dist/v1 && npx cross-env version=1 NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./build1/webpack.prod.conf.js --display-modules --display-chunks
scripts.build2: rm -fr dist/v2 && npx cross-env version=2 NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./build2/webpack.prod.conf.js --display-modules --display-chunks
scripts.build3: rm -fr dist/v3 && npx cross-env version=3 NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./build3/webpack.prod.conf.js --display-modules --display-chunks --display-optimization-bailout
